comments.body: would be good to mention `T` in the docs.

You might add an additional argument to this assert that is a string saying something like "The group value must be one of the keys in the children map."  That string will be printed along with the assert if it fires, and makes it easier to read.
It seems like this was not addressed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +82,86 @@        assert(children.length >= 2),
        assert(onValueChanged != null),
        assert(groupValue == null || children.keys.any((T child) => child == groupValue)),
        super(key: key);
